data.title: Gordon Ramsay Children (All About His Sons and Daughters)
data.meta_description: Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana share six children. Here's everything about Gordon Ramsay Children: Megan, Holly, Jack, Matilda, Oscar, and Jesse.
data.text:
Gordon Ramsay Children: Gordon Ramsay, the world-famous chef known for his fiery temper and culinary genius, is not only a master in the kitchen but also a dedicated father. Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana share six children: Megan, Holly, Jack, Matilda, Oscar, and Jesse each carving their own paths while reflecting aspects of their father’s vibrant personality and passions.

Gordon Ramsay is a renowned British chef, restaurateur, television personality, and author. Born on November 8, 1966, Ramsay has built an impressive career in the culinary world. He is known for his highly successful restaurants around the globe, many of which have earned Michelin stars. Beyond his restaurant empire, Ramsay is a prominent TV personality, famous for hosting popular cooking shows like “Hell’s Kitchen,” “MasterChef,” “MasterChef Junior,” and “Kitchen Nightmares.”

Gordon Ramsay and Tana Ramsay love spending time with their six children. They became first-time parents in 1998 when their eldest daughter, Megan Ramsay, was born. Megan is now 26 years old.

In 1999, they had fraternal twins, Holly Anna Ramsay and Jack Scott Ramsay, who are now 24 years old. Their next daughter, Matilda Ramsay, who is affectionately called Tilly, was born in 2001 and is now 22 years old.

In 2019, they welcomed their son Oscar James Ramsay, who is now 5 years old, after experiencing a miscarriage in 2016. Their youngest son, Jesse James Ramsay, was born in 2023. The birth of Jesse was a surprise to fans because Tana’s pregnancy was kept a secret.

Keep reading to know everything about Gordon Ramsay children: Megan, Holly, Jack, Matilda, Oscar, and Jesse.

Who are Gordon Ramsay Children?

Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana Ramsay have six children. Their eldest, Megan Ramsay, was born in 1998 and is now 26 years old. In 1999, they had fraternal twins, Holly Anna Ramsay and Jack Scott Ramsay, who are both 24 years old. Matilda “Tilly” Ramsay, born in 2001, is 22 years old and known for her cooking and TV appearances. Oscar James Ramsay, born in 2019, is 5 years old. Their youngest, Jesse James Ramsay, was born in 2023 and is a newborn. Jesse’s birth was a surprise to fans, as Tana’s pregnancy was kept secret.

Here’s everything you would like to know about Gordon Ramsay children.

Megan Ramsay, 26

Megan Ramsay, along with Tana Ramsay and Gordon Ramsay, attended the official launch event of Lucky Cat by Gordon Ramsay in Grosvenor Square, Mayfair on September 2, 2019, in London, England. The event had cocktails, canapés, sushi, sparkling sake, and music by DJ Fat Tony.

Gordon and Tana welcomed their first child, a daughter named Megan Ramsay, on May 16, 1998. Megan, the eldest Ramsay child, was the first in the family to get a college degree. Gordon shared his pride on Instagram, posting a photo of Megan in her graduation attire from Oxford Brookes University in June 2019.

Being the eldest has its ups and downs. In January 2023, Gordon talked on The Kelly Clarkson Show about how he wasn’t impressed with Megan’s boyfriend, Byron. Gordon playfully crashed their dinner date by FaceTiming Byron after getting his number from Tilly, Megan’s sister. Gordon’s interference left Byron “shaking,” but Megan quickly ended the call.

Also Check: Steve Harvey Kids (All About His Sons and Daughters)

Jack Scott Ramsay, 24

Jack Scott Ramsay, born on December 31, 1999, is the 24-year-old fraternal twin of Holly Ramsay. In October 2020, Jack joined the Royal Marines, and his father, Gordon Ramsay, proudly shared the news on Instagram with photos of Jack in uniform.

Before his military service, Jack appeared in the 2019 documentary series “Born Famous” and ran in the 2019 London Marathon. In a 2019 GQ interview, Jack discussed the importance of balancing hard work and leisure, highlighting quality time spent with his father. Gordon humorously noted Jack’s expensive tastes, referencing his custom Ferrari-themed bed.

Also Check: George Foreman Kids (All about his 10 Kids)

Holly Anna Ramsay, 24

Gordon Ramsay welcomed his daughter Holly Anna Ramsay into the world on December 31, 1999, along with her twin brother Jack Scott Ramsay.

In May 2021, Holly started her podcast, 21 & Over, to talk about mental health issues like anxiety and depression. The podcast provides a safe space for Holly to discuss her own struggles.

Holly revealed that she was diagnosed with PTSD, anxiety, and depression after a traumatic event at Ravensbourne University, where she studied fashion design. She kept it a secret for a year before opening up about it. Holly says her journey to healing is ongoing, but she hopes sharing her story will help others.

In December 2021, Holly celebrated one year of sobriety. She posted on Instagram about prioritizing her mental health and thanked everyone for their support. Her dad, Gordon Ramsay, left a loving comment saying how proud he is of her progress.

Also Check: Mariah Carey Kids (Meet her twins with Nick Cannon)

Matilda “Tilly” Ramsay, 22

Matilda “Tilly” Ramsay, 22, is a talented individual. Born on November 8, 2001, she shares her birthday with her father, Gordon Ramsay. They have a special bond, often sharing heartwarming Instagram posts about being birthday buddies.

Tilly loves cooking just like her dad and enjoys taking on TikTok challenges with him. At just 15 years old, she published her cookbook, Tilly’s Kitchen Takeover. Her cooking style is more flexible than her dad’s, making it easy to adapt recipes based on what ingredients are available.

From 2015 to 2019, Tilly showcased her cooking skills on the CBBC show Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch. Her father, Gordon Ramsay, praises her cooking, calling her “the number one in the household” when it comes to cooking

Tilly also explored dancing by participating in Strictly Come Dancing, where she and her dance partner exited the competition as the ninth couple.

Also Check: Deion Sanders Kids (All About his 5 Kids)

Oscar James Ramsay, 5

Gordon Ramsay announced the birth of his son, Oscar James Ramsay, on April 4, 2019, via Instagram, sharing joyful hospital photos. He humorously captioned the post,

“With three Baftas and an Emmy under our belts, we now welcome Oscar, born at 12:58 for lunch!”

The couple had hinted at their pregnancy in a New Year’s Day 2019 video with Tana cradling her bump. Oscar, born after a miscarriage in 2016, is often seen twinning with his dad, especially after a matching haircut in March 2022. Gordon jokingly mentioned passing on his “Hell’s Kitchen” legacy to Oscar, teasing him about becoming the new host.

Also Check:Mick Jagger Children (Everything to know about his 8 children)

Jesse James Ramsay

Jesse James Ramsay, the newest member of the Ramsay family, was born in November 2023. Tana and Gordon Ramsay kept the pregnancy a secret until his birth, announcing it on Instagram. Gordon shared,

“On my birthday, we welcomed Jesse James Ramsay, weighing 7lbs 10oz. With 3 boys and 3 girls, our family feels complete.”

In December 2023, Tana posted a picture of one-month-old Jesse, writing, “Already a month old, cherishing every moment with this little one.”

Who is Gordon Ramsay wife?

Gordon Ramsay wife is Cayetana “Tana” Elizabeth Hutcheson. Gordon met Tana in 1992 when he was 26 and she was 18. They dated for four years before getting married in December 1996. Tana, a Montessori-trained schoolteacher, became a bestselling author with six cookbooks focused on simple and delicious family meals. She is also a TV presenter. Tana was born on August 23, 1974, in Croydon, Surrey, and she does most of the cooking for their family.

Gordon Ramsay Net Worth

Gordon Ramsay net worth in 2024 is estimated at $220 million. This wealth comes from his success as a chef, restaurateur, cookbook author, TV personality, and producer.

Gordon Ramsay’s empire is growing. In 2019, he made a private equity deal with Lion Capital to create Gordon Ramsay North America, a part of his Gordon Ramsay Holdings, worth $100 million. Ramsay and Lion each own 50% of this company. They planned to open 100 restaurants in the United States by 2024, but due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the goal changed to 75 restaurants by 2026.

Ramsay’s brand is more than just TV and restaurants. He has his own wine brand, is part-owner of the HexClad cookware line, has a line of frozen entrees, and started his own cooking school in the U.K. in September 2021.

Conclusion

Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana Ramsay have built a wonderful family with their six children: Megan, Holly, Jack, Matilda (Tilly), Oscar, and Jesse James. Each child brings unique talents and joy to the Ramsay family. From Megan’s academic achievements to Holly’s podcast on mental health, Jack’s service in the Royal Marines, Tilly’s cooking and TV appearances, and the youngest, Oscar and Jesse, who bring youthful energy, the Ramsay children are thriving in their own ways. Despite their busy lives, Gordon and Tana prioritize their family, celebrating each milestone with pride and love.

Gordon Ramsay Children (All About His Sons and Daughters) – FAQs

What are the ages of Gordon Ramsay children?

Megan is 25, Jack is 24, Holly Anna is 22, Matilda (Tilly) is 22, Oscar James is 11, and Jesse James is the youngest, born in November 2023.

What notable achievements do Gordon Ramsay children have?

Megan has graduated from Oxford Brookes University, Jack has enlisted in the Royal Marines, Holly Anna hosts a podcast on mental health, Matilda published a cookbook at 15, and Tilly has showcased her culinary skills on TV and in her cookbook.

How does Gordon Ramsay support his children’s endeavors?

Gordon Ramsay shows pride in his children’s achievements, celebrates their milestones publicly, and engages with their interests, such as cooking challenges with Tilly and supporting Holly Anna’s podcast on mental health.

What challenges have Gordon Ramsay children faced?

Holly Anna has openly discussed her struggles with mental health, including PTSD, anxiety, and depression, highlighting the importance of awareness and support.

How has Gordon Ramsay’s family grown over the years?

Gordon and Tana Ramsay welcomed Oscar in 2019 and then Jesse in 2023, completing their family of three boys and three girls, adding new dimensions of joy and love to their household.
